description: In this Office Suck episode, Pascal receives Italian Stallion Elio as he takes a first look at his performance with Manuel Deboxer in Vice Versa. Little did I know that Elio would have liked me to be in that scene! That I once gave him the best blowjob he ever had and was hoping for an encore! I sure made up for it in this one. title: Office Suck 2, Scene #01
